author: deweese
msg: 1) elem.style.setProperty now works for short hand properties.
2) Incremental improvement to the Update Region colecing code
(modest gain for documents that move lots of things at once).
3) Cool update region debug tool (uncomment the SVGUpdateOverlay
4) Minor fix in Aspect ratio fitting for transcoders.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Added Tonny Kohar's contribution to Batik - Thanks Tonny!
2) Added JSVG a very simple SVG viewer to the contrib area.

author: deweese
msg: 1) No longer builds area objects for sensitive regions,
now passes hit test point to shape painters directly.

author: deweese
msg: Greatly reduced the inital overhead of pointer events.
Now computes 'sensitive bounding box' from source geometry bounding boxes
rather than from union of sensitive regions.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Modifying the visibility of images at runtime now works properly.
